coreAttributes.name: Witch's dress
coreAttributes.description: A smart shirt, with accompanying waistcoat.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] on the Witch's dress, tidying the skirt down before moving the straps into a comfortable position on [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the Witch's dress over [npc2.namePos] head and down around [npc2.her] torso, tidying the skirt before moving the straps to sit comfortably on [npc2.her] shoulders.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the Witch's dress over [npc2.namePos] head and down around [npc2.her] torso, pulling down the skirt before moving the straps to sit on [npc2.her] shoulders.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] Witch's dress up over [npc.her] head and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] Witch's dress up over [npc2.her] head and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of [npc2.namePos] Witch's dress, before roughly pulling it up over [npc2.her] head and taking it off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] Witch's dress back down into the proper position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] Witch's dress back down into the proper position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] Witch's dress back down into the proper position.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc.her] Witch's dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] Witch's dress.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of the bottom of [npc2.namePos] Witch's dress, before roughly pulling the skirt up.
